name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程以國內外新聞時事為教材，訓練學生從新聞的字彙入門，並藉由增加詞彙量與練習重要句型，使學生進而能閱讀與理解英文新聞。教材將選自報紙/雜誌（如China Post與Taipei Times雙語新聞）或線上新聞（如VOA Special English）中適合初級學生之各類新聞（如政治、經濟、科技、娛樂與時尚新聞等），以有效提升其基本英文閱聽能力。
schedule:
Week 1 Course Intro: Introduction to News English
Week 2 Understanding News Media
Week 3 News Article 1
Week 4-5 Online Assignment
Week 6 News Article 2
Week 7 News Article 3
Week 8 Halloween Special News Report
Week 9 Schoolwide Midterm
Week 10 Course Midterm
Week 11 Thanksgiving Special News Report
Week 12 News Article 4
Week 13 News Article 5
Week 14 News Article 6
Week 15 Final
Week 16 Christmas Special News Report
Week 17 New Years Special News Report
Week 18 Schoolwide Final
scorePolicy:
Schoolwide Midterm 15%
Schoolwide Final 15%
Course Midterm 15%
Course Final 15%
In-class participation 40%
